sentence.Network_en: The UN is an organisation which has long since outlived its usefulness.
sentence.Network_cn: 联合国是一个早已形同虚设的机构。

sentence.Network_en: There are doubts about the usefulness of these tests.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些试验是否有用，人们有所保留。

sentence.Network_en: The report is of potential usefulness to the government.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个报告可能对政府有用.

PerfectNetExp.abs: （1）有用性（usefulness）（Usefulness）：构件必须提供有用的功能；（2）可用性（Usability）：构件必须易于理解和使用； （3）质量（Quality…

...优势国内一些域名投资者注册大量.us域名并不在于看中了us的国别意义,而是把它看成us(我们)的含义,他们认为这才是.us的对于大众的真正意义在有超过33,000家的美资企业以及100,000家.
alfred binet believed his iq test should be used to ., 比奈智商测试 , 相信他应该用于.

entry.tran: 有用的；可用的；有助益的
entry.def: If something is useful, you can use it to do something or to help you in some way.

example.ex: The slow cooker is very useful for people who go out all day...
example.tran: 慢炖锅对于整天都不在家的人来说很有用。

example.ex: Hypnotherapy can be useful in helping you give up smoking...
example.tran: 催眠疗法可能有助于你戒烟。

entry.def: If an object or skill comes in useful, it can help you achieve something in a particular situation.

example.ex: The accommodation is some distance from the clubhouse, so a hire car comes in useful.
example.tran: 住处离会所有一段距离，所以租一辆车会很有用。

means.word_mean: 1. the quality of being of practical use

auth_sentence.content: That in and of itself does not imply usefulness.
auth_sentence.res_content: That in and of itself does not imply usefulness.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That in and of itself does not imply usefulness.

auth_sentence.content: Opinions on the usefulness of home banking varied widely.
auth_sentence.res_content: Opinions on the usefulness of home banking varied widely.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Opinions on the usefulness of home banking varied widely.

auth_sentence.content: So both their use and their usefulness were extremely limited.
auth_sentence.res_content: So both their use and their usefulness were extremely limited.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So both their use and their usefulness were extremely limited.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表名词,"性质,状态",通常加在形容词后面

stems_affixes.word_buile: bright明亮的+ness性质,状态→n.明亮,辉煌,聪明
busi+ness性质,状态→n.商业,买卖,交易,生意
careful小心的,仔细的+ness性质,状态→n.仔细,慎重
clean清洁+li+ness性质,状态→cleanliness洁癖,清洁

stems_affixes.value_cn: 意识,知觉,自觉,觉悟,个人思想
stems_affixes.word_buile: conscious意识到的+ness性质,状态→n.意识,知觉,自觉,觉悟,个人思想
dark黑暗+ness性质,状态→n.黑暗,阴暗,秘密
empty空的+ness性质,状态→emptiness空虚,无知
firm坚定+ness性质,状态→n.坚定,稳固
forward向前的,鲁莽的+ness性质,状态→n.大胆,鲁莽
fulsome过度的,虚假的+ness性质,状态→n.虚情,谄媚

stems_affixes.value_cn: 仁慈,亲切;好意;友好行为
stems_affixes.word_buile: kind仁慈的,和蔼的+ness性质,状态→n.仁慈,亲切;好意;友好行为
like像+ness性质,状态→n.相象,相似物
polite有礼貌的+ness性质,状态→n.有礼,优雅
positive肯定的+ness性质,状态→n.肯定,信心
pretentious自命不凡的+ness性质,状态→n.自命不凡
prompt敏捷的,迅速的,即时的+ness性质,状态→n.敏捷,迅速
tight紧的+ness性质,状态→n.坚固,紧密
tired疲乏的+ness性质,状态→n.疲劳,疲倦
useful有用的+ness性质,状态→n.有用,有效性
useless无用的+ness性质,状态→n.无用
weak弱的,虚弱的+ness性质,状态→n.虚弱,软弱,弱点,缺点
thick厚的+ness性质,状态→n.厚度,浓度,稠密

sentences.en: The index adds appreciably to the usefulness of the book.
sentences.cn: 索引明显地增加了这本书的实用价值。

sentences.en: The report is of potential usefulness to the government.
sentences.cn: 这个报告可能对政府有用。

sentences.en: The theory is of limited usefulness.
Badly written questions limit the usefulness of questionnaires.
sentences.cn: 问题设计得不好，调查问卷的用途就会打折扣。
